xwikidoc.author: XWiki.sdumitriu
xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #medsavant on 26 July 2013
xwikidoc.content: <misko_> has joined #medsavant 03:19 <misko__> has joined #medsavant 03:42 <mcupak> has joined #medsavant 04:54 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 08:38 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 09:34 <mcupak> has left #medsavant 11:01 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 12:44 <bvancea_> has joined #medsavant 12:50 <sdumitriu1> Was it good? 12:50 <bvancea> tasted familiar 12:51 <sdumitriu1> :D 12:52 <bvancea> so I'm trying to find an elegant manner to index the variants from the medsavant gui 12:53 <bvancea> the way medsavant does it currently is: you upload a file, medsavant parses the variants, writes them into several smaller files as tab separated values, and then load into DB using LOAD DATA INFILE 12:53 <bvancea> http://dev.mysql.com/doc/refman/5.0/en/load-data.html 12:54 <bvancea> not sure how to abstract that 12:54 <bvancea> I'm thinking to do the parsing and abstract the insert with a JPQL query 12:55 <bvancea> and the ICE implementation will handle the splitting and loading, etc 13:41 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 14:14 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 14:26 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 14:52 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 15:01 <sdumitriu1> has joined #medsavant 16:58 <bvancea> has joined #medsavant 18:02 <marta> has joined #medsavant 19:07 <phenotips_org> has joined #medsavant 20:11 <sdumitriu> has joined #medsavant
